landing.bio: Im a Web  and mobile Development Engineer  student at ENSIAS . I love building things !,and i really appreciate teamwork . Im currently looking for a end-of-studies internship where i can contribute to a challenging project and  gain more experience .

experience.aboutWork:
Responsible for building a web application for Resources
and Cost Management that facilitate managing projects..
Developing a mobile application that helps in managing the consultation of commercial activities indicators.

education.university: Preparatory classes for schools | CPGE Med 5

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time reading interesting articles ,practicing sports watching my favorite tv shows.and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

extracurricular.paragraphOne: i was a member the ENACTUS club and a member of the Vintage Club musical cell
